name: Parking is a Nightmare
description: The parking situation on campus has recently become a ridiculous nightmare. I feel like they keep reducing the amount of parking without actually giving us a method of getting around campus. The scooters are cool but like you have to pay for them and not everyone wants to or can afford that. I feel like there should be better parking options for students.

name: DC and OE food
description: Honestly the DC and OE food can be super unhealthy and I'd appreciate if there were more healthy options at the eating spaces.
comments: It's not all that bad but yeah more healthy options could be cool

name: Public transportation sucks
description: The public transportation here I feel like isn't the greatest, especially on campus or when you're going to and from places here.

name: Lack of Communication From Professors
description: Professors don't always have the best communication with students, and that really makes classes stressful sometimes. I would love for certain professors to try to communicate with us better..

name: AS Food Pantry at Weird Times
description: Am I the only one that feels likethe AS food pantry is at the worst times?? Every time the AS food pantry happens I'm in class and I cannot ever make it. I feel like offering a survey or more times for students to attend would be really nice.

name: Why do graduating seniors have to be stuck waiting for grades
description: I know theres a lot of students who aren't graduating seniors, but for those of us who are, waiting for your grades as the semester winds down is insanely stressful and makes me anxious. I understand that professors need time to grade everything but for us having to fret about redoing a class is just lame.
